Package romanemperorsscraper.ui

Class ButtonProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • romanemperorsscraper.ui.ButtonProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackToGraphButton, CloseDynastyTreeFrameButton, DynastyChoiceButton, ExportButton, GoToSuccessorButton, ImportButton, PeopleListOpenButton
    public class ButtonProperties
extends javax.swing.JButton
    Class defining the main properties of a button (borders, size, icon variants, [...]). Other classes will inherit and recall its constructor.
    Author:
    Sara Lazzaroni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ButtonProperties​(java.lang.String buttonIconPath, java.lang.String buttonRolloverIconPath)
      Construct a ButtonProperties object by eliminating the JButton's borders, setting its size and icon variants Please note that the given rollover icon will also be used as button disabled icon

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonProperties

        public ButtonProperties​(java.lang.String buttonIconPath,
                        java.lang.String buttonRolloverIconPath)
        Construct a ButtonProperties object by eliminating the JButton's borders, setting its size and icon variants Please note that the given rollover icon will also be used as button disabled icon
        Parameters:
        buttonIconPath - the button's icon path
        buttonRolloverIconPath - the button's rollover icon path
